body_html: @mohnkhan BTW, AMD are building an alternative path that's fully open source - translating the CUDA code to OpenCL code with a compiler toolchain. I'm not sure what the status of that is for the older cards like mine though.
body_text: @mohnkhan BTW, AMD are building an alternative path that's fully open source - translating the CUDA code to OpenCL code with a compiler toolchain. I'm not sure what the status of that is for the older cards like mine though.
body: @mohnkhan BTW, AMD are building an alternative path that's fully open source - translating the CUDA code to OpenCL code with a compiler toolchain. I'm not sure what the status of that is for the older cards like mine though.
